AboutMe

Hello, I am an NCARB registered architect licensed in Florida and New Jersey. I am interested in designing the synthesis of the digital and the physical world, because I believe they will become more integrated.

README-GENIE

Built With: JavaScript

A CLI that walks you through the best practice questions to be answered about your project and standard features. Then, it generates the README file so that most of it is done with little effort yet inspires authentic responses that are difficult when cutting and pasting templates.

View Project on GitHub
